[PATCH 0337/7508] Fix TTextProtocol to support Union TTextProtocol can not handle TUnion structure: When computeFieldNameMap in StructContext.getCurrentThriftMessageClass(), it looks up the callstack to determine which structure currently is being parsed. It works for most of cases, exception TUnion, because TUnion has its implementation of read/write and any TUnion thrift structure does not override its read and write class. As a result, when the parser comes to any TUnion, it only knows TUnion, but not the specific thrift struct. Thus we can't get the field map.

[PATCH 013/153] Fix TTextProtocol to support Union TTextProtocol can not handle TUnion structure: When computeFieldNameMap in StructContext.getCurrentThriftMessageClass(), it looks up the callstack to determine which structure currently is being parsed. It works for most of cases, exception TUnion, because TUnion has its implementation of read/write and any TUnion thrift structure does not override its read and write class. As a result, when the parser comes to any TUnion, it only knows TUnion, but not the specific thrift struct. Thus we can't get the field map.
